about_the_game:
Everything did not go according to the plan. Sooner or later, being in control of the refinery could slip away from your hands. And well… It did. The deadly Sawblade attack took everything from you. Your friend, Victor, is gone. Fuel gone. Equipment gone. Crew members gone. Time to assemble the first vehicle from scrap, gather a new crew and get back on track. There is no time to waste, because The Great Storm is coming.

Turn-based vehicle combat

You'll embark on desert pursuits, and sometimes fighting will be inevitable. Command your crew and use your vehicle weapons most effectively in an intense turn-based combat system.



Dynamic economy

Dust Raiders features a dynamic economy system with demand and supply, and random events that can affect the market. You'll need to make strategic decisions about what goods to buy and sell to maximize your profits.



Ride customization

Helping struggling enclaves, finishing quests and gathering crew members will unlock new customization options for your vehicles.



Vast hostile areas to explore

In order to complete main story and side missions you will need to explore four huge hostile areas ranging from borders of Eternal Desert, through contaminated marshes and abandoned Polis.

content_descriptors.notes: Most mature contect would come from car fights, where you and your enemies try to shoot down each other cars using weapons. Other than that the story itself will mention about violence and criminal acts happening in the wasteland. You will also deal with outlaws and criminals.

name: Dust Raiders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080

short_description: Dust Raiders is a management strategy game, set in a lawless wasteland. Upgrade your vehicles, engage in tactical fights against raiders hunting for your resources and gather a crew to rule the area.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
